item.title: End-to-End Automation of Private Cloud Automation Validated Solution
item.description: If your not already familiar with the Private Cloud Automation for VMware Cloud Foundation validated solution it’s primary purpose is to implement a modern cloud automation platform that delivers self-service automation, DevOps for infrastructure, and orchestration. This is achieved through the deployment of vRealize Automation and the integration with one of more VMware Cloud Foundation instances. The roles and personas documented (here) should be considered as a minimum requirement when implementing the Private Cloud Automation validated solution but there is nothing stopping customers adding more granular roles where possible or even personas that better align with their own organizations roles and responsibilities.
